attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
"Defence of Dwelling (Illegal Intruders) Act 2007" is my proposal.

By posting a formal notice on my house and in the local paper, I can assume that an intruder who illegally enters my house has surrendered all legal and human rights.  If the intruder suffers injury or death as a result, no claim can be made against me.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
